creator: ioki
descriptionHtml:
Der kvgOF Hopper kommt wie gerufen

Sie wollen zur Arbeit, zum Markt oder noch schnell in in die Apotheke, haben aber kein Auto und der Bus kommt erst in einer Stunde? Der Hopper kommt auf Abruf zu Ihnen und bringt Sie direkt an ihr Wunschziel innerhalb des Bediengebiets Offenbach. So müssen Sie sich nicht an feste Fahrpläne oder vorgegebene Routen halten.

Der Hopper ist gemeinschaftlich

Sie teilen sich das Fahrzeug mit anderen Fahrgästen, die ein ähnliches Ziel haben. Ein smarter Algorithmus optimiert die Route in Echtzeit, sodass sie stets auf dem schnellsten Weg zum Ziel gelangen. Das schont die Umwelt und Ihren Geldbeutel.

Hopper macht das Leben einfach

Mit dem Hopper müssen Sie sich keine Gedanken mehr darüber machen, wie Sie sich fortbewegen. Denn der Hopper macht Sie mobil und bringt Sie dahin, wo Sie wollen - ganz flexibel und ohne Planungsaufwand.

Bediengebiet, Bedienzeiten:

Wo: Kommunen Hainburg, Seligenstadt und Mainhausen (Erweiterung ist geplant)

Wann: Montag bis Sonntag, 5:30 - 1:30 Uhr
descriptionShort: The little bus that always can

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Hallo Google Play Store 👋

title: kvgOF Hopper 2.0

creator: ioki
descriptionHtml:
Need to get to work, the market or the pharmacy, but don't have a car and the bus only arrives in an hour? kvgOF Hopper comes to you on demand, taking you directly to your desired destination within the Offenbach operating area. Travel directly to your destination whenever you want without fixed timetables or routes.

With Hopper it's a joint ride.

You share the vehicle with other passengers who
have a similar destination. A smart algorithm
optimises the route in real time so that they
always get to their destination the fastest way.
This protects the environment and your wallet, too.

Hopper makes life easy

With Hopper, you no longer have to worry about how to get around. Because Hopper makes you mobile and takes you where you want to go - completely flexible and without any planning effort.

Operating area, times:

Where: Hainburg, Seligenstadt and Mainhausen (expansion is planned)

When: Monday to Sunday, 5:30 am - 1:30 am
descriptionShort: The little bus that never sleeps

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Noch mehr Übersicht für einfachere Buchungen 🔍🤳: Ab sofort wird Dir im neuen, dynamischen Buchungsprozess frühzeitig angezeigt, ob eine Fahrt zum gewünschten Zeitpunkt im ausgewählten Gebiet verfügbar ist. Durch die Implementierung der neuen Funktion wird die Chance auf eine Übereinstimmung zwischen Fahrtanfrage und Fahrtangebot stark erhöht.

Wann geht’s bei Dir das nächste Mal los? 👀🚎

descriptionHtml:
Need to get to work, the market or the pharmacy, but don't have a car and the bus only arrives in an hour? kvgOF Hopper comes to you on demand, taking you directly to your desired destination within the Offenbach operating area. Travel directly to your destination whenever you want without fixed timetables or routes.

With Hopper it's a joint ride.

You share the vehicle with other passengers who
have a similar destination. A smart algorithm
optimises the route in real time so that they
always get to their destination the fastest way.
This protects the environment and your wallet, too.

Hopper makes life easy

With Hopper, you no longer have to worry about how to get around. Because Hopper makes you mobile and takes you where you want to go - completely flexible and without any planning effort.

Operating area, times:

Where: Hainburg, Seligenstadt and Mainhausen (expansion is planned)

When: Monday to Sunday, 5:30 am - 1:30 am
descriptionShort: The little bus that never sleeps

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Mobility is more than just getting from A to B. It all starts in our minds and is above all important for us to be able to stand together, even in extraordinary times like these.

We are constantly developing our app and accompany you on your way. Book your next ride now!

We look forward to your rating.

creator: ioki
descriptionHtml:
Need to get to work, the market or the pharmacy, but don't have a car and the bus only arrives in an hour? kvgOF Hopper comes to you on demand, taking you directly to your desired destination within the Offenbach operating area. Travel directly to your destination whenever you want without fixed timetables or routes.

With Hopper it's a joint ride.

You share the vehicle with other passengers who
have a similar destination. A smart algorithm
optimises the route in real time so that they
always get to their destination the fastest way.
This protects the environment and your wallet, too.

Hopper makes life easy

With Hopper, you no longer have to worry about how to get around. Because Hopper makes you mobile and takes you where you want to go - completely flexible and without any planning effort.

Operating area, times:

Where: Hainburg, Seligenstadt and Mainhausen (expansion is planned)

descriptionShort: The little bus that never sleeps
